channel.title: plot on Sergio Lopez Olvera | Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in plot on Sergio Lopez Olvera | Data Scientist

item.title: Protected Natural Area location
item.description: Data import Imported a .pdf document from a mexican government website, splitted strings on “/n” and unlisted the items. Then detected the string “Página 50” to get to the page where the coordinates table begins. The document looks like below. ## [1] "GACETA" ## [2] " ÓRGANO DEL GOBIERNO DEL ESTADO DE VERACRUZ DE IGNACIO DE LA LLAVE" ## [3] " OFICIAL" ## [4] " DIRECTORA GENERAL DE LA EDITORA DE GOBIERNO" ## [5] " ELVIRA VALENTINA ARTEAGA VEGA" ## [6] " DIRECTORA DE LA GACETA OFICIAL" Data cleaning and wrangling Cleaned and wrangled the data using string trimming, detecting and replacing into a tidy format tibble.

item.title: Water Availability
item.description: Data import Imported data from local databases related to water availability of three rivers in the watershed and water use permits. The next tibble is an example of the raw imported data. ## # A tibble: 6 x 5 ## Mes Año Gasto Aguas Presa ## <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr> <chr> ## 1 1 2018 434 Arriba Pixquiac ## 2 2 2018 408 Arriba Pixquiac ## 3 3 2018 316 Arriba Pixquiac ## 4 4 2018 262 Arriba Pixquiac ## 5 5 2018 239 Arriba Pixquiac ## 6 6 2018 679 Arriba Pixquiac Data cleaning and wrangling Mutated and united some rows to format a date column as y/m/d, then binded some data frames for a visual comparative analysis.

item.title: Water quality
item.description: Data import Imported data from local databases related to water quality of three rivers in the watershed and mexican and international standards. The next tibble is an example of the raw imported data. ## # A tibble: 6 x 73 ## Año `2005...2` `2005...3` `2005...4` `2005...5` `2006...6` `2006...7` ## <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr> ## 1 Fecha 28/01/05 12/04/05 28/07/05 11/10/05 12/01/06 07/04/06 ## 2 pH In si~ 7.
